title: matching system
body:
why f was i mateched with challenger?
before starting game i gave game for winning up 
i m f normal diamond 4 and there were challenger on enemy team in rank game 
wtf is happening in oce server are u serious?
and u made unbalanced game 
u just setted gold 1 on enemy team 
was it real? 
wow if u wanted  to make fair game u might set a bronze or iron rank guys right?
even trash platinum guys lost by gold 1 adc lul is it fair rank system?
i'm seriously considering about deleting game
my free 20 lp gone 
and even i failed to promote to d 3
coz i matched trash guys up for twice in promotioin 
i really want to delete game

replies.body:
Your grammar and spelling is terrible to the point where I can barely read it.

I have been matched against master and challenger in ARAM (as unranked 4 lyf), I was never phased. IDGAF what your rank is, I CAN KEEELLLL YOU!!!!
